procedure.title: Install the &wec;

listitem.para: glibc version 2.12 is available on all platforms supported by &product; 7.0. However, in the case of Red Hat Enterprise Linux, an upgrade to version 6.9 or newer is required.

procedure.para: The &wec; is bundled into the &abbrev; installers from version 7.0.6 onward. A SysV init script and a systemd service file are provided and installed automatically, so by installing &abbrev;, you also install &wecabbrev;. However, syslog-ng-wec is not registered to start at boot.

step.para: To start syslog-ng-wec at boot, register the init script using the following commands:

listitem.para: On SysV-based systems: chkconfig or update-rc.d

step.para: For details on how to start syslog-ng-wec manually, see .
